content:
Hi! I am a third-year PhD student at Northwestern University in the CS theory group very fortunate to be advised by Prof. Konstantin Makarychev and Prof. Aravindan Vijayaraghavan. Before joining Northwestern, I was an undergrad at Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur where I majored in Computer Science and Engineering, and minored in Physics.
I am broadly interested in theoretical computer science. Presently, I am working on projects related to Approximation algorithms and Theoretical machine learning.

title: Aravind Reddy
